kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: window.scrollTo(0,370) Without any arguments.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.
kw.msg: Current page contains element '//*[@class="MuiTypography-root MuiTypography-h4" and text()="Ethereum"]'.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Reload Page
kw.doc: Simulates user reloading page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.
kw.msg: Current page contains element '//*[@class="MuiTypography-root MuiTypography-h4" and text()="Ethereum"]'.

test.name: Crypto Converter

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Sending key(s) ('500',) to //*[@class="MuiInputBase-input MuiOutlinedInput-input"]//ancestor::div[label="insert crypto amount"] element.

kw.name: Get Value
kw.doc: Returns the value attribute of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
